sequence.successMessage: All documents have been signed successfully!

single.condition: This is a qualified electronic signature which has equivalent legal effect of a handwritten signature.
single.instruct: Waiting for other signers. The signed document is available for download as soon as other parties sign it.
single.notification: All parties have successfully signed the document.
single.seal3: This is a qualified electronic seal which ensures document’s origin and integrity of this document.
single.standard: Conforms to European cross border document standard
single.title: Document Information

smartID.signingNotice2: Please authenticate using the mobile app
smartID.warning: Make sure that the verification code matches the code displayed on your mobile phone screen.

usb.checkidwaring: Required software is missing or not available.
usb.usb1: E-signature. Please wait searching for devices.
usb.usb4: By choosing the certificate, I agree to the transfer of my name and personal identification code to the service provider

electronicid.step11: Get a Qualified Electronic Signature in minutes.
electronicid.step12: Make sure you have the following before starting:
electronicid.step14: A valid document in its original form to verify your identity
electronicid.step17: A device with a card reader is plugged
electronicid.step21: Please accept provider’s terms of service.
electronicid.step24: and consent to the processing of biometric data.
electronicid.step32: Insert/place the document on the card reader.
electronicid.step33: Do not move while reading in progress
electronicid.step51: Please smile and follow the prompts below.
electronicid.step53: Please, look to the camera to scan your face
electronicid.step62: Please do not close this page. After your identity is verified, next step will open automatically.
electronicid.step63: Verification process might take up to 5 minitues.
electronicid.step71: Enter your phone number to receive a verification code.
electronicid.step81: Enter the code that was sent to your phone.
electronicid.step83: Enter The Code That Was Sent To Your Phone
electronicid.step84: Verification process might take up to 5 minitues.
electronicid.step91: Enter your email address to receive a verification code.
electronicid.step101: Enter the code that was sent to your email.
electronicid.step103: Enter The Code That Was Sent To Your Email
electronicid.step104: Verification process might take up to 5 minitues.
electronicid.step112: Please accept our certification terms to sign the document.
electronicid.step121: You are ready to sign the document.
electronicid.step122: Confirm your phone number in order to sign the document with a Qualified Electronic Signature.
electronicid.step131: Enter the code that was sent to your phone.
electronicid.step132: A verification code has been sent to your phone:
electronicid.step133: Enter The Code That Was Sent To Your Phone
electronicid.step134: Verification process might take up to 5 minitues.
electronicid.other1: You can't skip a step that isn't optional.
electronicid.cam oneface: JUST ONLY FACE ON THE CAMERA.
electronicid.cam lookstraight: PLEASE LOOK DIRECTLY AT THE CAMERA.

validation.val1: This validation report is prepared by a Qualified Trust Service Provider, UAB, in accordance with
validation.val2: Qualified Signature validation Service Practice Statement and Policy
validation.overview4: This validation report shows the validity of the signatures and seals at the specified validation time.
validation.overview6: Advanced and Qualified Electronic Signatures and Seals
validation.tooltip: Qualified validation for electronic signatures and seals with a standard liability assurance of 100 EUR.
